item.title: Swift Playgrounds 4 release imminent
item.description: Finally seems like the wait is about to get over and soon you will be able to install Swift Playgrounds 4 on your iPads. Apple.com still mentions vague “available late 2021” release date, but you should expect the release within a couple of weeks. Why? Here are some points to back it: Xcode 13.2 beta (released initially on October 27th) has support for “app projects created with Swift Playgrounds 4”.
